## 1. Load the libraries (tidyverse and palmerpenguins)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
penguins
```

## 2. Dimensions 
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

## 3. Names of variables(columns)
```{r}
names(penguins)
```

```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```

## How many individuals sampled on each island
```{r}
penguins <- penguins #see the data
```

```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```
```{r}
penguins$island #not very helpful
```
```{r}
summary(penguins$island) #clean as well. 
```


## Mean body mass for all individuals
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```
